summary: A troubled high-school kid pretending to be dying of cancer confronts problems with his new girlfriend and terminally ill father as he struggles with his daily existence.
cast: Dan Byrd|Emily VanCamp|Richard Jenkins|Adam Goldberg|Billy Lush|Camille Mana|Jesse Head|John Aylward|Sewell Whitney|Bobbi Kotula|Kevin Partridge|Jeff Rosick|Jerry Sciarrio|Trent Sweeney

title: Norman
